title: Corn flakes mixture | Snacks
content:
Snacks recipe: Corn flakes mixture Servings: 6 Duration: 15 minutes Ingredients:
  • Corn flakes - 250 grams
  • Cashew nuts - 1/2 cup
  • Peanuts - 1/2 cup
  • Golden raisins - 1/2 cup
  • Split roasted Bengal gram - 1/2 cup
  • Curry leaves - 1/4 cup
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Red paprika - 1/2 tbsp
  • Oil - To deep fry
Procedure:
  • First, heat oil to deep fry. when the oil is hot, fry corn flakes in batches
  • Take out them when done
  • Then fry cashew nuts, peanuts, Bengal gram, and raisins each one separately
  • Take out them, when the color changes to light brown
  • Next, turn off the heat and fry curry leaves
  • Take out all the fried ingredients on kitchen tissues, to remove excess oil
  • Now add salt, red chilly powder and Gently mix. Next, goes in red paprika
  • Combine well and store in an airtight container to remain fresh and crisp.
  • Happy cooking and have a nice day
